Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).(n)

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent').(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell (Nicole Kidman) rejects the stifling rigidity of life in turn-of-the-century England, leaving it behind for a chance to travel to Tehran. She begins her lifelong adventure across the Arab world, a journey marked by danger, a passionate affair with a British officer (James Franco), and an encounter with the legendary T.E. Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).(n)

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.(n)

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this drama in which Academy Award winner Angelina Jolie's kidnapped son is found alive. She realizes that the child returned to her is not her own. She faces corrupt police and a skeptical public in her relentless pursuit of answers, only to be confronted by a truth that will change her forever. Set in 1920s Los Angeles, the film also stars Academy Award nominee John Malkovich.(n)

programme.title: Maytime
programme.desc: In the third pairing of "Singing Sweethearts" Nelson Eddy and Jeanette MacDonald, she portrays an opera star reminiscing about her career and a tragic romance with a street singer (Eddy) in Paris and later the U.S. The score was Oscar-nominated.

programme.title: Rose Marie
programme.desc: An opera singer, on the hunt for her own criminal brother, goes undercover and ventures into the Canadian wilderness.

programme.title: Naughty Marietta
programme.desc: A French princess flees to Colonial New Orleans to avoid her arranged marriage, and unexpectedly finds true love in this lighthearted operetta.

programme.title: New Moon
programme.desc: Romberg and Hammerstein's operetta set in 18th-century Louisiana concerns the relationship between a haughty plantation owner and her handsome bondservant, who's actually a French nobleman in disguise.

programme.title: Island of Love
programme.desc: Runyonesque caper about a con man (Robert Preston) teaming with a writer (Tony Randall) to turn an island into a phony tourist trap. Georgia Moll, Walter Matthau, Betty Bruce, Michael Constantine. Filmed in Greece.

programme.title: Onionhead
programme.desc: A lazy college student joins the Coast Guard as a cook when his grades drop and his relationship with a girlfriend sours. Fully expecting to sit out WWII in peace and quiet, instead, he runs afoul of navy protocol in general and an officer in particular.

programme.title: Ensign Pulver
programme.desc: Joshua Logan's sequel to "Mister Roberts," about life on a World War II Navy cargo ship, features Robert Walker Jr. as the title character, an officer butting heads with his tyrannical skipper. Jack Lemmon won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as Ensign Pulver in the original. Jack Nicholson appears in the supporting cast.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: A woman in Paris flees murderous crooks who seek a hidden World War II fortune stolen by her late husband, and receives unlikely assistance from a handsome sophisticate with a hidden agenda.

Igor: Rick Lenz. Sanchez: Vito Scotti. Mrs. Durant: Irene Hervey. Georgia: Eve Bruce. Smartly directed by Gene Saks. I.A.L. Diamond screenplay. Quincy Jones score.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: When a misguided transmission sends a squadron of bombers hurtling towards Russia, fully prepared to drop their atomic weaponry on Moscow, an Air Force commander desperately tries to establish radio contact with the planes, but once the pilots have passed the "fail safe" point, they've been instructed to disregard any reversal of orders.

programme.title: The Sunshine Boys
programme.desc: Neil Simon adapted his Broadway hit about two elderly ex-vaudevillians who have been feuding for years but agree to put aside their differences for a TV reunion. In his first starring screen role in 35 years, George Burns took home a Best Supporting Actor Oscar. Simon's screenplay was Oscar nomimated.

programme.title: The Odd Couple

programme.desc: In 1958 Hollywood, a romance blossoms between a pious actress and a right-wing chauffeur—even though both of them work for reclusive billionaire Howard Hughes, who forbids his employees to date each other. Their secret liaison plays out while Hughes' aviation innovations keep pace with his debilitating eccentricities. (cc).

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Biopic of the Tejano singer who was gunned down by an assistant at the height of her fame. The focus is primarily on Selena's relationship with her family, including her demanding manager-father, and her rise to stardom. (cc).

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: This historical drama recounts a real-life slave revolt that occurred in 1831 Virginia, led by a black preacher named Nat Turner. Turner is so appalled by the horrors he sees while sermonizing that he is moved to fight back. (cc).

programme.title: Elizabeth The Golden Age
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett reprises her role as Queen Elizabeth I in this account of her efforts to defend England from King Philip II of Spain, while trying to suppress her attraction to the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh. (cc).

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: In the immediate aftermath of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, his wife Jacqueline deals with her immense grief while caring for her young family and making plans for his funeral procession. At the same time, a bereaved nation watches on. (cc).

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A husband and wife in Nazi-occupied Poland use their positions as caretakers at the Warsaw Zoo to shepherd Jews out of the country. Based on a true story. (cc).

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A warrior named Conan seeks revenge on the man who killed his parents, but is tasked with helping save the daughter of a king who has come under the spell of the same man who Conan seeks to slaughter. (cc).

programme.title: The Book of Eli
programme.desc: Eli roams a postapocalyptic world, protecting a sacred tome that offers guidance on how to rebuild humanity. The evil Carnegie goes to great lengths to acquire the powerful book, but Carnegie's adopted daughter, who wants to escape her dad's clutches, helps Eli. (cc).

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A suicidal former Union soldier ends up joining a Sioux tribe. He then takes up arms to defend them when the Army attacks. (cc).

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar winner Julia Roberts as a sassy, low-level law-office worker who becomes obsessed with a case involving a California utility company that's accused of polluting the drinking water in a small town. The real-life Erin Brockovich has a cameo as a waitress named Julia. (cc).

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Miles and Jack take a trip to California's wine country the week before Jack gets married. While Miles wants to turn Jack on to the art of wine tasting, Jack longs to exploit his last days as a bachelor when they encounter two fascinating women. (cc).

programme.title: Abandon
programme.desc: A bright college student is haunted by her past in this thriller. Katie Burke is a driven senior at a prestigious college whose boyfriend, Embry, vanished years earlier. Katie's life unravels when a cop investigates the disappearance and Embry begins showing up on campus. (cc).

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A sheriff is contacted by his former fiancée, who claims that her daughter is missing. He travels to an island, where the girl was last seen, but finds that there is a sinister Wiccan community there blocking his investigation. (cc).

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser is a raider of the lost sarcophagus in this high-tech, effects-filled remake of the 1932 Universal Pictures horror classic. Evelyn: Rachel Weisz. Jonathan: John Hannah. Imhotep: Arnold Vosloo. Directed by Stephen Sommers. (cc).

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: While still on the lam, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name. (cc).

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run regrets checking in at the Bates Motel, a lodge operated by a strange man with an unhealthy fixation on his mother. Remake of the Hitchcock classic. (cc).

programme.title: Lowriders
programme.desc: An aimless young street artist in L.A. named Danny finds himself torn between the lowrider car culture of his father and his desire for a creative outlet. This generational clash is further complicated when Danny's older brother returns home from prison. (cc).

programme.title: Nell
programme.desc: A young woman living in an isolated North Carolina cabin is discovered by a small-town doctor, who is fascinated by her and attempts to introduce her to the world. Based on the play "Idioglossia" by Mark Handley. (cc).

programme.title: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: A troubled 9-year-old tries to convince her psychologist father that creepy recent events are the work of her imaginary friend. Although he is amused at first, the father soon becomes worried about his daughter's growing emotional problems. (cc).

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider The Cradle of Life
programme.desc: The feisty video-game heroine goes against an evil scientist who specializes in biological weapons as they both race to find Pandora's Box. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Suffering from writer's block, an unstable author is accused of plagiarism. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A centuries-old war between vampires and werewolves, and a vampire-hunting human who becomes entangled in their conflict. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art-gallery owner reads a novel written by her ex-husband, and becomes greatly disturbed by the possibility that the story was inspired by their marriage and that her safety is in jeopardy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three teenagers are kidnapped and imprisoned by a man with multiple-personality disorder, and must plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas—young or old, male or female, benign or monstrous—they will confront on the way out. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: A Russian gangster hires a mysterious, high-tech assassin (Bruce Willis) to kill a high-profile American citizen. Formulaic. Loosely based on the far superior 1973 film "The Day of the Jackal." Richard Gere, Sidney Poitier. Michael Caton-Jones directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: A biography of the Teamsters Union boss is told in flashbacks from his rise and fall as a labor reformer to his disappeared in 1975. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A character study-turned-thriller about a cabdriver who ferries a hit man on a late-night killing spree in Los Angeles. Foxx was nominated for Best Supporting Actor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins the Crusades and tries to achieve peace between Muslims and Christians. Meanwhile, violent agitators on both sides foolishly strive to end the peace in a bid for greater power. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: A bumbling gambler scrapes together the cash to join a high-stakes poker game, while fending off a larcenous woman who also wants in. (cc).(n)

programme.title: You Got Served
programme.desc: The members of B2K star in this saga about street-dancers who compete in impromptu contests judged by the public. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: A recent film-school grad gets a dream job as a personal assistant to a Hollywood mogul, who not only tyrannizes him, but also takes credit for his script. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Film Stars Don't Die in Liverpool
programme.desc: A May-December romance blooms between a young English actor named Peter Turner and aging Hollywood movie star Gloria Grahame. When the actress develops terminal cancer, Turner cares for her while she stays at his family's home in Liverpool.

programme.title: Love & Bananas An Elephant Story
programme.desc: Most of the elephants living in Asia have been captured and forced to become service animals, greatly affecting their population. Famed Asian conservationist Lek Chailert and an American crew attempt to rescue a captive elephant in Thailand.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: A tough, demanding businesswoman discovers that she's about to be deported back to Canada, forcing her to rush into a marriage of convenience with her young assistant in order to stay in the U.S. But the ruse becomes even more complicated when the two must visit his family in Alaska while posing as a couple. (cc).

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: A velvet-clad, sex-crazed secret agent from the 1960s agrees to be put into a state of suspended animation after his arch-enemy escapes justice. Thirty years later he is defrosted to do battle with the power-mad villain again, but the mission proves nearly as daunting for him as getting to grips with 1990s social values. Spoof spy adventure, with Mike Myers, Elizabeth Hurley, Mimi Rogers, Michael York and Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A down-and-out Detroit youth with a dead-end job and an unstable home life pursues a career as a rap artist. Rabbit has just been dumped by his girlfriend, forcing him to move back in with his emotionally unstable mother. Convinced his skills as a rapper are his only real hope at a better life, he makes music with a group of underground artists. But as a white rapper, Rabbit struggles to be taken seriously in a predominantly black musical tradition. (cc).

programme.title: Shock Docs
programme.desc: Documentary exploring some of Britain's most bizarre parent-child relationships, where the mums and dads will do anything to look better than their kids. Those featured include 39-year-old Georgina, who was once a frumpy mum but has now followed daughter Kayla by becoming the image of a Barbie doll, complete with fake boobs and lips. Forty-five-year-old Paul is constantly muscling in on the action with his 18-year-old bodybuilder son Kyle, and former glamour model Charmaine loves flaunting what she has, much to the embarrassment of 14-year-old Yasmin. But when she decides to go back to modelling, how will her daughter react?

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.(n)

programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.(n)
